text: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ ٱلۡأَطۡفَٰلُ مِنكُمُ ٱلۡحُلُمَ فَلۡيَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُواْ كَمَا ٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

translation.en: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise
translation.id: Dan apabila anak-anakmu telah sampai umur dewasa, maka hendaklah mereka (juga) meminta izin, seperti orang-orang yang lebih dewasa meminta izin.569) Demikianlah Allah menjelaskan ayat-ayat-Nya kepadamu. Allah Maha Mengetahui, Mahabijaksana
